page.title: 03THE RAILWAY MISSION CREWE
page.content: The Railway Mission Church got it's name because the Church used to be down by Mornflake Oats next to the railway line.This is an Evangelical Church.It has been a Church for 5 years but before it became a Church it used to be an old cheese factory.At the Church they have regular Sunday morning services.There is a separate room for children and their age groups.Here are some examples: Toddlers from the age of 2 and 9, Juco's for children aged 10 and 11, Covananters for children aged 13 to 18. At the church baptisms ,weddings, and funerals take place.There is also a meeting for older people and a mother's meeting for mothers who have children.Anyone is welcome to come and take part in the services.
